quote: They will serve as luminaries in the expanse of the heavens to shine upon the earth.” And it was so.
Later the king of Egypt spoke to the Hebrew midwives whose names were Shiphʹrah and Puʹah,
for he will be great in the sight of Jehovah. But he must drink no wine or any alcoholic drink at all, and he will be filled with holy spirit even from before birth,
